extension.summary: Movies and TV Shows on [COLOR red]FlixNet[/COLOR]
extension.description: Created by developer [COLOR red]JP Hightek[/COLOR] for Jesus Box Media. Please visit [COLOR red]www.jesusboxmedia.tv[/COLOR] for FlixNet support and assistance! Please remember that Flixnet is not an official part of the Kodi media player you are running, and therefore is not to be mentioned within official support channels of Kodi, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor it’s intended use, it is simply a third party plugin which has been added to your system.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.
extension.description: Bitte besuche [COLOR red]www.jesusboxmedia.tv[/COLOR] für Unterstützung und Fragen zu FlixNet! Beachte dabei, dass FlixNet nicht offizieller Teil des Media Players ist den du gerade verwendest und daher nicht von dem offiziellen Support-Kanäle abgedeckt wird, dieses Addon hat nichts zu tun mit dem Media-Player selbst, noch ist es dafür beabsichtigt, es handelt sich hierbei lediglich um ein Drittanbieter-Anwendung die dem System hinzugefügt wurde.
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Content-Anbietern.
extension.description: SVP visitez [COLOR red]www.jesusboxmedia.tv[/COLOR] pour avoir de l'aide sur FlixNet. Prenez note que FlixNet n'est pas une partie intégrante de votre outil de visionnement multimedia et SVP ne le mentionnez pas dans les media sociaux officiels, cet addiciel n'a rien a voir avec votre lecteur multimedia lui même, c'est simplement un addiciel qui a été ajouté à votre système.
extension.disclaimer: L'auteur n'héberge pas ou ne distribue pas le contenu qui vous est affiché avec cet addiciel. L'auteur n'a pas d'alliance avec les distributeurs de contenu.
extension.news: - Initial release - Free movies - Free TV Shows

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
Packed for KODI from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com[CR]www.omdbapi.com[CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Themes for flixnet are maintained separately to make distribution of the the addon itself easier/faster.
Metadata for flixnet are maintained separately to make distribution of the the addon itself easier/faster.
Browse, stream or download your favourite songs and albums
extension.news: fixed by qahanik (thank you very much!) / changed versioning to date-format / fixed album downloading / minor cosmetic cleanups

extension.description: Pandora Internet Radio
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.summary: All the best from cCloud TV
extension.description: cCloud is an open source cloud based social IPTV service. It is built by the community for the community, where streaming is just a click away. Just click, play and stream. Yes, it's that simple. Just go to [COLOR blue]http://ccloudtv.org[/COLOR] and enjoy:) Please report any channels that are down here [COLOR blue]http://www.tiny.cc/reportchs[/COLOR] Users can now check servers status which can be found at [COLOR blue]http://ccloudtv.org/status[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Watch Major American Television Networks Live for Free!
extension.description: Please visit https://www.tvaddons.co for addon support! Watch Major American Television Networks Live! Entirely Legal and Free! You can also record content with a paid DVR account or by using DVR referral points. Signup for a free account through the following link today: http://watch.ustvnow.com
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007
extension.news: -14.8.1 [CR]Added error message for Free Accounts over 45 days old[CR]Fixed a few issues with playing recordings [CR][CR]See the changelog.txt file for previous updates.
